sentences.sContent: “Those teams feel that football is about scoring goals,” he said. “That is our challenge.
sentences.sContent_eng: “Those teams feel that football is about scoring goals,” he said. “That is our challenge.
sentences.sCn: “那些队认为足球就是得分进球”，他说，“那是我们的艰巨任务。

sentences.sContent: This allows a modeler to see all of the gathered metrics for that element and decide whether it is just one metric that is problematic or whether that element is scoring badly in several ways.
sentences.sContent_eng: This allows a modeler to see all of the gathered metrics for that element and decide whether it is just one metric that is problematic or whether that element is scoring badly in several ways.
sentences.sCn: 这样还允许模型构建者为这个元素查看搜集的所有矩阵，从而确定它仅仅是一个有问题的矩阵或者这个元素是否在几个方面得分都很不理想。

words.tran: （竞赛等的）记分员；记录员；得分者；刻划痕迹的人
获得；评价；划线，刻划；把…记下

trans.tranOther: the act or practice of scoring
